entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
